Texts.Eng:
Don't be fooled by their tricks, they mastered the art of disguise a bit too well.

  Diet: ^yellow;Omnivore^reset;

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health x^green;1.12^reset;
  ^yellow;+25^reset;% Energy Regen
  Damage x^green;1.15^reset;
  Resist: +^green;50^reset;% Shadow
  Fall Damage x^green;0.4^reset;
  Immune: Darkness/Shadow
 
^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Dark Biomes:
    Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;30^reset;% Energy Regen, -^green;25^reset;% Hunger Rate
  In cold or hot biomes:
    Health x^red;0.9^reset;, -^red;15^reset;% speed & jump and -^red;30^reset;% Energy Regeneration.

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Wands/Staves: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% Energy Regen
  Dual Wand: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance
  Living weapons: Defense x^green;1.15^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  No trade credibility: -^red;30^reset;% Charisma
  Resist: -^red;40^reset;% Cosmic, -^red;25^reset;% Fire, -^red;20^reset;% Ice
  Energy x^red;0.8^reset;
